definition: a quantitative or qualitative test of a substance (especially an ore or a drug) to determine its components, to analyze chemical substances
details:
noun
- a quantitative or qualitative test of a substance (especially an ore or a drug) to determine its components
- an appraisal of the state of affairs
= example: an appraisal of the state of affairs
= synonyms: check
- a written report of the results of an analysis of the composition of some substance
- a substance that is undergoing an analysis of its components
verb
- to analyze chemical substances
= example: to analyze chemical substances
- to make an effort or attempt
= example: to make an effort or attempt
= synonyms: attempt
